extendedInfo.description: A beautiful customization pack inspired by google glass.Simply installing this application you will have:4 glass resizable clock widget with the font of google glass    with opening touch app clock.7  beautiful live wallpaer:   Glass                                          Glass Light Blur                                          Glass Nexus Phase                                          Glass Nexus White Space                                          Glass Phase Beam                                          Glass Lines                                          Glass Night Sky 14 blur  colored  backgroundsYou can find widget in widget picker, live wallpapaper in live wallpaper picker and a wallpaper picker with the static background.tags: Google glass pack Google glass live wallpaper Google glass clock widget galaxy s4 glass asphalt 8 Asphalt 8 Airborne Asphalt8

reviews.title: Not fully working
reviews.comment: The night sky lwp doors not load on my galaxy s3. I uninstalled and reinstalled and still not working...
reviews.author: John Kistler

reviews.title: Clean and gorgeous!
reviews.comment: Loving all three digital clocks. Analog is basically JB 4.2 style. LWP\'s are very clean and not too busy. Would be nice If LWP\'s and clocks had some customizability. Would also love if widgets could work on lock screen too. I like my LS & HS to match. 5 stars if any of these are implemented. I LOVE the static wallpapers!!!!!
reviews.author: Colin Simone

reviews.title: Nice start
reviews.comment: Very clean and simple, maybe add a few more options as far as the clock widget. Wallpapers are nice, could use a couple of darker ones. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Armondo Magdaleno
